name: DRIFT KING DEATH MACHINE
description:
Compete for the high score  and survive as long as possible in this action packed, top down, bullet-hell. Drift around enemy fire peppering them with your machine gun, get up close and blast them with the shotgun, or deliver strikes with deadly precision using the sniper.

CONTROLS

WASD to drive

Mouse to aim and shoot

Spacebar to drift

E & Q to switch weapons

Escape to quit.

Have fun!
